pullrequest.title: Add carriage return support to outputbox

content.raw:
This is great! I use tqdm too so that's really nice.

The application of formatting to the whole block is a loss in functionality - can it be avoided? Usually in practice formatting is not mixed on a line, but I'd rather not require it. With this change, a subprocess launched via zprocess that writes to stdout and then stderr without a linebreak in between will have the stdout appear red too.
content.html:
This is great! I use tqdm too so that's really nice.

The application of formatting to the whole block is a loss in functionality - can it be avoided? Usually in practice formatting is not mixed on a line, but I'd rather not require it. With this change, a subprocess launched via zprocess that writes to stdout and then stderr without a linebreak in between will have the stdout appear red too.
